Questions: When does your organization prefer to detect attackers: at initial access, during lateral movement, or at their final objective (e.g., data theft or disruption)?

2. We want to prioritize detections of attackers navigating through the network
3. We want to prioritize detections of attackers when they attempt to damage our organization.
